sentences.en: Are you in character somber, melancholy, or neglectful?
sentences.cn: 你生性阴沉 、 忧郁, 或是不修边幅 吗 ?

sentences.en: Boys are usually neglectful of their appearance.
sentences.cn: 男孩子通常不注意自己的仪表.

sentences.en: Felt, worsted, paper these packages lining materials, a little neglectful of, not a flattened to wrinkle.
sentences.cn: 毡呢 、 精纺毛料 、 纸这些包衬质料, 稍微不夺目, 铺不平坦不离便当起皱.

sentences.en: Have I been neglectful of my friend, taking him for granted?
sentences.cn: 我是不是对朋友不够尽心，太不把他当回事了？

sentences.en: He is neglectful of his duties.
He is neglectful of his own safety.
Neglected by her parents, she hangs with a bad crowd, gets pregnant and becomes a neglectful parent.
sentences.cn: 她的父母不管她, 她和坏人们混在一起, 并且怀孕成为了未婚妈妈.

sentences.en: One of them has been neglectful of answering letters or keeping appointments.
sentences.cn: 朋友可能会变成敌人是因为一方不回信或是不赴约.

sentences.en: She became neglectful of her appearance.
She was neglectful of her clothing.
Some boys are neglectful of their appearance.
sentences.cn: 有些男孩子不注意自己的仪表.

sentences.en: This does not mean that we have been neglectful of China.
sentences.cn: 这并不是说,我们以前不重视中国.

words.tran_cn: 被忽视的；未被好好照管的
微不足道的，可以忽略的
疏忽的；忽略的；不小心的

trans.tran_en: not looking after something properly, or not giving it enough attention
